phrase.item: Ash soup (soup made of flour, oil and water)
The main soup is made out of flour, buttersoup and milksoup.
But from that word ash soup is taken.
Ashsoup is made this way: Ash should be sieved in ordero to get ground.
Then they boil the water an mix the ground ash with that
and it becomes ashsoup.
Ash soup is for the person who catches cold or sterving and not able to talk..
As ash is warm and fron the ash soup they put on his mouth, whenever the person regain consciousness then he will be given butter soup
If they don't give him the ash soup, he won't be able to digest dishes and dies.
Mumjoji
The real Mumjoji drops from the mountains
A person collects that, it looks like small round ritual bread.
That is a medicine.
They put ot on warm water, take it through turban and then drink it.
If any place enjured or cought cold, they mix it with warm water and milk all together and rub it.
Another is pika
Pika looks like rats, it lives aound the summer pastures
Pika has yellow color.
That is used for treatment.
Whatever part of body is or enjured, they rub it there.
hoarseness
Hoarseness is a type of sickness that appears on the neck.
That can be treated with rooster's blood
When the pesron'voice changes into the rooster's voice, then they figure out that person has hoarse sickness.
The rooster will be sacrifaced holding it on the person's throat.
The blood goes inside his throat, and then the sickness goes away.
Making dough
Whenever a child borns, they rub a dough on his face in order the child not to be hairy
the dough is mixed with the newborn's mother milk and then they put it into the piller.
Then they take from the piller and gove it to the dogs.
Making line between eyebrows.
To make line between eyebrows is not allowed for everyone.
It has bee told that of you make line beween eyebrows for someone that person won't have any illness.
It is marked between two eyebrows aligned with the nose
First coal ash should be grounded, then they take sharp razor
They cut it (between brows) and put the ground ash in the cut place.
Making line between brows both, male and female can do it, it shoild be done when a child is one month to one year old.
Experienced old woman does that, not everbody can make lines between brows.
Nowadays bobody makes line between brows.
Instead of making line between brows, they make a small mark like other s do tatto.
On face two places they mark, on forehead and chin
They make it on hand and wrist as well.
Outgrowth
The soup froth or dough rub on the outgrowth, on your hand, forward it to the dog, he licks it.
On Friday take flour on your hand,
One foot is on this side of threshold, another is on the other side.
Then hold flour on the hand and blow it to the door side.
On Friday wash your hand in old grave and the outgrowth will go away.
Mugh [Mugh is a general term in Wakhi for different kinds of nervous convulsions, typically in children but occasionally also in adults]
When a child cries we say that the child got mugh
Then they put in his mouth a type of grass which smells very bad.
Rub it into the stone, then hold it on his hand and put in his throat.
When the child gets (muɣ), they pass him through the single pillar, they hold yeast om his head or pass him through round tress.
They rub the uper mouth of the child with soot, black smoke, then it goes away.
The child pees from crying.
If this unbalance continues, will kill (the child).
Because of that there is this type of old woman medecine: rub the upper mouth, give mumjoji, and rifle medecine.
They take thr yeast through (the child), rotate him through the pillar.
They burn the ritual grass and the smoke goes to the child, or juniper is also good. (NOT SURE ABOUT JUNIPER)
Exuding of salt
The exuding of salt sometimes can be find under the stones mixed with dirt, like nitrate.
If animals eat a specific type of grass in the mountain, in their intestines worm, some animals die in an hour after eating the grass.
It's called animal desease
Salt exuding is threatment for that.
Cow's urine
Usually female wash their hair with cow's urine, if some ladies whho has brittle hair.
Some women drink it if they have Istiqo (name of an internal disease).
Istiqo, was told, is a type of disease that frog becomes like baby donkey, that grabs on human's belly.
For that old cow's urine is good, the ritual's grass root becomes like small bread and its very bitter.
They give it to that person.
If that disease dies inside the person, that person will be alive, if it doesn't die that person will die.
Ulcer growth (bod)
Bod is a type of disease that can appear on foot, belly, skin, nose and neck.
The treatment is those people hwo eat caper, won't get this type of sickness.
Caper is a type of three that that has long stem like figs tree, but it has thorns.
It's pepper is like unready, like bud.
They pick it then macerate in the water.
Then is blooms, the spiciness becomes les.
Then they cook it with the oil.
The spiciness gets very less, that medicine takes the ulcer growth away.
Pika
Pika is like a mouse but it is round.
It lives in high mountains or whereever caves are, makes a hole and lives there.
It is said that he eats enchanting grass.
An enchanting grass is praised that whoever eats that he will live very long.
Because of that pika is remedy.
If someone have intestines pain, for example, when a women delivers or delivers and the baby dies, they catch the pika and kill them.
Then they pound if all and dont throw away anything from there.
They fry it.
The sick person, woman or wife drinks two spoons from the fried pika's (oil) without any food in the morning.
She adds two spoons with the warm water and takes shower with that.
Her child won't day.
Another treatment is, it manures
and sleeps on top of it.
Wind blows it and snow covers it.
Whoever have muɣ (type of sickness) or stomach pain, they give him from that manureand then drinks.
It is called Mumijo.
